roleset.name: characterized by tightness, stiffness, or spasms

example.name: spasticity-n
example.text: Patient experiences intermittent spasticity in her right extremities .
example.amr: (s / spastic-01 :ARG1 (p / patient-yy) :location (a / anatomical-site :pl + :name (n / name :op1 "right" :op2 "extremity") :part-of p) :manner (i2 / intermittent))

roleset.note: NOTES: Added for THYME-AMR. AMR annotators: ARG1 may be used for body parts if it is explicitly the spastic entity ("spastic right leg"); otherwise use :location to relate body parts.
